subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Nicklas Lidstrom became the first European defenseman to reach 1,000 points, assisting on two goals in the host Detroit Red Wings’ 5-2 victory over the Los Angeles Kings.
snippet: Nicklas Lidstrom became the first European defenseman to reach 1,000 points, assisting on two goals in the host Detroit Red Wings’ 5-2 victory over the Los Angeles Kings.
